Translations.Text: Tin segkwent i iunzen i Öebbi, akked Umazan iS, u txeddem ayen ilhan, ad as Nefk arraz berdayen, u Nhegga yas d l$it ukyis
A tilawin n Nnbi! Ur tellimt am tlawin nniven. Ma têezzbemt, ur teppeccvemt deg wawal, a kwent isirem umuvin n wul. Inimt awal uwqim

Ilimt deg ixxamen nnkwent. Ur pcebbiêemt acebbeê n at war tussna imenza. èÈéalemt, zekkimt, ôavimt Öebbi akked Umazan iS. Ib$a kan Öebbi a kwent ipwakkes nnkel, a tawacult n Uxxam. U, a kwent Izzizdeg nezzeh
Mmektitemt ed ayen i kwent $ôan, deg ixxamen nnkwent, n issekniyen n Öebbi, akw n ûûwab. Ih, Öebbi Izga d Laîif, Ippuxebbeô

Ih, imvuâen, timvuâin, lmumnin argaz tameîîut, itubiyen, titubiyin, wid akked tid issawalen tidep, iûebôiyen, tiûebôiyin, wid akked tid ippagwaden, wid akked tid ipseddiqen, wid akked tid ippuéumen, wid akked tid ipêaraben $ef tuzzuft nnsen, wid akked tid id immektayen aîas Öebbi; i wigi, Ihegga d Öebbi ssmaê akked warraz abarar
Ur issefk ara i win, ne$ tin iumnen, ad smenyafen lameô nnsen, ma Iseyya d lameô Öebbi, akked Umazan iS. Win inuqmen Öebbi, akked Umazan iS, ni$ innetlaf ttelfan n ûûeê

Mi tenniv i win I$at Öebbi, u t$atev: "jmaâ $uôek, tameîîut ik, êezzeb i Öebbi"; teffrev deg iman ik, ayen ara d Isban Öebbi. Tugadev medden. D Öebbi, i iwatan a T tagwadev. Mi s ibra Zayed, Njewo ik yides, iwakken ur teppili lhejna i lmumnin, ma u$en tilawin n wid id ssekren, mara ad sent brun. Ad iûaô lameô n Öebbi
Ur telli lhejna f Nnbi, deg wayen Iêeppem fellas Öebbi; d tannumi n Öebbi $ef imezwura. Lameô n Öebbi izga ipwafta
Wid issawaven tibôatin n Öebbi, i T ippagwaden, ur ppagwaden yiwen, siwa Öebbi. Öebbi Iqadd i uqeîîi
Ur illi Muêemmed d ababat n yiwen seg irgazen nnwen, maca, d Amazan n Öebbi, u d aneggaru n lambiyya. Öebbi Izga Issen yal cci
A wid iumnen! Mmektit ed Öebbi, maççi d izli
Sbuccuâet eP, ûûbeê, tameddit
D Neppa i d Inuben fellawen, akked lmalayek, iwakken a kwen Issuffe$ si tillas ar tafat. Izga Ipêunu $ef lmumnin
Asmi ara T magren, azul nnsen d: "tifrat"! Ihegga yasen d arraz ukyis
A Nnbi! Nuzen ik id d anagi, d abcir u d aneddaô
i ineccden ar Öebbi, s tsriê iS; d asavef icaâlen
Becceô lmumnin s lfevl ameqwôan i nitni, s$uô Öebbi
Ur ppa$ awal i ijehliyen akked ixabiten. Ur ssemêas, i ccum nnsen. Ppkel $ef Öebbi, Iqadd Öebbi d Awkil
A wid iumnen! Ma tu$em tid iumnen, sinna, tebram asent, uqbel ma tennulem tent, ur fellawen ad asent têesbem tallit. £itet pent, serrêet asent, s wudem uwqim

A Nnbi! Nêell ak tilawin iwumi tefkiv tiqviâen nnsent, tiklatin ik, si tid i k Iqsed Öebbi, iss is n âam ik, tid n tâamtin ik, tid n xal ik, tid n txaltin ik iunagen yidek, tameîîut iumnen, ma tefka iman is i Nnbi, ma ib$a Nnbi a p ya$. D lemziyya i keçç, war lmumnin. Ni$ Neéôa acu i sen Nseyya af tlawin nnsen, akked teklatin nnsen. Iwakken ur teppili fellak lhejna. Öebbi Izga Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu

A ppesganiv tin i k ihwan segsent. A d tawiv $uôek tin i k ihwan, ne$ tin teb$iv si tid tâazlev. Ur fellak tuzzma. Akka i iwulem, iwakken ad qenâant, ur $webbnent, ad ôavint akw, ayen i sent tefkiv. Öebbi Iéôa i illan deg ulawen nnwen. Öebbi Izga d Amusnaw, Iêellem
Ur ak êellent tlawin, sya d asawen, ne$ abeddel n tlawin, xas tâaoeb ik ûûifa nnsent, siwa tiklatin ik. Öebbi Izga Issikid yal cci

A wid iumnen! Ur keççmet ar texxamin n Nnbi, ar awen iâammed, d inebgawen ar wuççi, ur teggunim. Maca, ma tepwâaôvem, kecmet. Mi teççam, sahlet; ur ssiôxiset ameslay. Ayagi, s tidep, iqelleq Nnbi. Isetêa segwen. Öebbi ur Ipsetêi $ef tidep. Ma tessutrem asent ta$awsa, ssutret ep deffir tsabert. Yif it wakka, i tezdeg n wulawen nnwen, akked wulawen nnsent. Ur awen ilaq ara a pjjerim Amazan n Öebbi, ne$ a ppa$em tilawin is, deffir es, d awez$i. Ayagi, ad yili, ar Öebbi, d lefviêa
Ama tessknem d lêaoa, ne$ teffrem p, Öebbi, s tidep, Iéôa yal cci

Ur telli tiyta degsent af ibabaten nnsent, arraw nnsent, atmaten nnsent, arraw n wamaten nnsent, arraw n tsetmatin nnsent, tilawin nnsent, ticrikin nnsent. Ad êezzbent i Öebbi. Öebbi, s tidep, d Anagi n yal cci
Öebbi akked lmalayek iS, s tidep, Nuban $ef Nnbi. A wid iumnen! Nubet fellas, ternum as azul aêmayan
Ih, wid ijjerin Öebbi akked Umazan iS, Ixza ten Öebbi, di ddunit, di laxeôt. Ihegga yasen d aâaqeb isdullun
Wid ijjerin lmumnin, argaz tameîîut, $ef wayen ur ksiben, ni$ bbwin acehrir akked ubekkav n ûûeê
A Nnbi! Ini i tlawin ik, i iss ik, i tlawin n lmumnin, ad jemâant ijufaô nnsent. Ppif akka, a tent âaqlen, ur tent pooerin. Öebbi Izga Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Ma ur êbisen ara ixabiten, imehzulen n wul, akked wid ipxeôôiven di Lmadina, ad ak Nebges $uôsen. Sinna, siwa cwiî n tallit ara yilin, degs, d loiran ik
Ad pwaxzun anda ten nufan, ad pwaîîfen, ad pwan$en akw
D tannumi n Öebbi ar wid iâaddan zik. Ur teppafev, d awez$i, abeddel, di tannumi n Öebbi
Steqsan k imdanen, af yimir. Ini: "it Issnen siwa Öebbi". Anwa ad ak imlen, amar imir iqeôb ed
Öebbi, s tidep, Ixza ijehliyen, Ihegga yasen d u$ud
Ad wekkôen degs, i lebda; ur ppafen bab, ne$ asettaô
Ass ideg ara zzin wudmawen nnsen, ar tmes, ad inin: "a yamxix nne$! A lemmer nunez i Öebbi, u nunez i Umazan
Ad inin: "a Mass nne$! Nekwni nunez i igeldan nne$, i imeqwôanen nne$, telfen a$ ar yir abrid
A Mass nne$! Aâqeb iten berdayen, u Xzu ten s leqseê
A wid iumnen! Ur ppilit am wid i ijjerin Musa. Izekka t Öebbi, seg wayen id nnan. Illa ar Öebbi d amxallef
A wid iumnen! Ëezzbet i Öebbi, tinim awal umâin
Ad awen Iûeggem igiten nnwen, ad Isemmeê ibekkaven nnwen. Win iôuvan Öebbi akked Umazan iS, ni$ ibbwi arraz ameqwôaêan
Naâôev a nefk lamana i igenwan, i tmurt, i idurar. Ugin a p îîfen. Ugaden p. Ibubb ip umdan. Neppa ard amednus ur nessin
Ihi, ad Isâaddi Öebbi aâaqeb af ixabiten akked txabitin, wid akked tid ipcaraken. Ad Issuref Öebbi i wid akked tid iumnen. Öebbi Izga Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Ccekôan i Öebbi, i iIan i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. I Neppa, ccekôan di laxert. Neppa, d Bab n ûûwab, Ippuxebbeô
Iéôa ayen ikeççmen di tmurt, ayen id iteff$en segs, ayen id iprusun seg igenni, ayen ippalin $uôes. Neppa Ipêunu, Ipsemmiê

Nnan wid ijehlen: "ur a$ d ippas yimir". Ini: "xaîi, s Mass iw, ara kwen id ias"! Amusnaw n tbavnit, ur idrig fellaS ubruy ubelkim, ama deg igenwan, ama di ddunit; ama seddaw wannect is, ama sennig es; akw, di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ad Ikafi wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan. I wigi, ssmaê akked ôôeéq ukyis
Wid ikkaten deg issekniyen nne£, sfunnugen, widak, fellasen aâaqeb n twa$it taqeôêant
Wid iwumi teppunefk tmusni, walan ar ayen id irsen $uôek, s$uô Mass ik, d tidep. Ippawi s abrid n Uzmir, Amaâzuz
Nnan wid ijehlen: "day ad awen nessken argaz, ar awen d yinin ar ma teftutsem, yal aftutes, i kunwi lxelq amaynut
Iger ed tikerkas $ef Öebbi, ne$ d aôehbani"? Xaîi, wid ur numin ara s laxeôt, haaten deg uâaqeb, akked ttelfan u$miq

Day ur walan ara ayen illan zdat sen, u deffir sen, di tmurt akked igenwan? Ma ihwa ya£, a ten Nger seddaw tmurt, ne$ a d Nesse$li fellasen igezzim seg igenni. Deg wayagi, ih, d assekni i yal amdan ucâif
Ni$ Nefka s$uône£ lfevl i Dawed. A yidurar, alset yides akked ifrax. Nerra yas uzzal d aleqqaq
Eûnaâ tibedâiyin n wuzzal, qiss tindar. Xeddmet ayen ilhan. Nek, Pwali$ ayen txeddmem
I Sliman: avu. Win n ûûbeê, aggur; win n tmeddit, aggur. Nelli yas taâwint n nnêas. Kra n leonun ad xedmen fellas, s tsriê n Mass is. Win degsen, iveôfen i lameô nne£, Nessukk fellas, aâaqeb ujajiê
Xeddmen as ayen ib$a: leowamaâ, tiâancuôin, loefnat am iêvunen, ticcuytin iqaâden. Exdem s tnemmirt, a tawacult n Dawed, drus n yimdanen iW i isnemmiren
Mi Nseyya fellas tameppant, ur as faqen ara immut, armi içça taâkwazt is, ubaââuc n wakal. Mi i$li, êulfan leonun ar, lemmer day ssinen tabavnit, ur qqimen deg uâaqeb isdullun
Ni$, i Saba, assekni di tnezdu$in nnsen. Snat tebêirin, ta yeffus, ta zelmev. Eççet si l$it n Mass nnwen, u snemmret aS. Tamurt ilhan, Mass Ipsemmiêen
Wexxôen. Nuzen asen aêemmal n Âarim. Tibêirin nnsen, nerra tent d tibêirin id ippaken l$ella ôéagen, tammemayt, akked tzegwart taxeîîayt
Akka ay ten Nqeîîi $ef tijehli nnsen. Day a Nqeîîi wur nejhil
Nerra garasen u ger temdinin i$ef Nburek, timdinin id ivehôen. Nektal tikli garasent: "merêet degsent di laman, am yiv, am ass
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! Zzi$wzef tallit ger zziaôat nne$"! Densen iman nnsen. Nerra ten d tiqûivin. Nesqucc iten wakali. Ih, deg wayagi, war ccek, d issekniyen i yal aûebôi isnemmiren
Ni$ Iblis itebbet ed, segsen, ameyyez is. Vefôen t, siwa arbaâ si lmumnin
Ur isâi kra udabu fellasen. Iwakken kan, a Nissin anwa iumnen s laxeôt, u anwa i illan, fellas, di ccekk. Mass ik Ipêarab af yal cci
Ini: "naâret wid i tepkabarem, war Öebbi. Ur sâin taéeyt ubelkim, deg igenwan ne$ di tmurt; ur criken degsen; ur aS illi, garasen, umâiwen
Cafuâa, s$uôeS, tenfaâ kan win iwumi ip Irad. Alamma, ma tekkes tugdi seg wulawen nnsen, a d inin: "acu id Inna, Mass nnwen"? A d inin: "d tidep, u Neppa d Aâlayen, d Ameqwôan
Ini: "anwa ikwen ip$aten, si tmurt akked igenwan"? Ini: "d Öebbi". Nekwni am kunwi, amendeô ma nella di nnhaya, ne$ di ttelfan n ûûeê
Ini: "ur teppuqeîîim $ef wayen nfalîa, ur neppuqeîîi $ef wayen txeddmem
Ini: "ad a$ Issemlil Mass nne$, sinna, ad Iêudd garane$, s tidep. Neppa d Amêaddi Amusnaw
Ini: "sseknet iyi d wid i tqeônem $uôeS, d icriken"! Xaîi, Neppa d Öebbi Uzmir, Bab n ûûwab
Ur k id Nuzen, i imdanen, armi d uqniâ; a pbecôôev, a pnedôev. Maca, tegwti n yimdanen, ur ssinen
Qqaôen: "melmi lemâahda agi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "$uôwen ppaâud ass, ur tezmirem a t teswexxôem, ne$ a t id tesqeôbem, s saâa

Nnan wid ijehlen: "ur neppamen, d awez$i, s Leqwôan agi, ne$ s wayen it id izwaren". Lemmer a pwaliv mara bedden imednas, ar Mass nnsen, pmeslayen garasen. Ad inin uôhifen i imzuxiyen: "lemmer maççi d kunwi, yili nella d lmumnin
Ad inin imzuxiyen i uôhifen: "day d nekwni ikwen isfeô$en af nnhaya, mi kwen id iusa? Xaîi, tellam d ibe$wviyen

Ad inin uôhifen, i imzuxiyen: "xaîi! Nncub, iv akked wass, mi têeppmem, fellane$, a nagwi Öebbi, u ad aS negg tanudda". Ffren nndama mi walan aâaqeb. Nerra tiqwlavin $ef imegôav n wid ijehlen. Day ara ppuqeîîin $ef wayen ur xdimen
Ur Nuzen ara kra uneddaô ar temdint, mebla ma nnan imeôkantiyen is: "nekwni, ih, nugwi ayen is id teppuceggâam
Nnan: "nekwni, n$elb ik ayla, tarwa. Ur nelli d wid ara ippuqeîîin
Ini: "ihi Mass iw Ip$iti win i S ihwan u Iwezzen; maca, tegwti n imdanen, ur ssinen
Maççi d ayla nnwen, ne$ d tarwa nnwen, ara kwen id iééiéen nezzeh $uône£, siwa wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan. I nitni arraz berdayen, ilmend n wayen xedmen. Ad ilin, di laman, di t$uôfatin
Ma d wid ikkaten deg issekniyen nne£, sfunnugen, widak a d rsen i uâaqeb
Ini: "ih, Mass iw Ip$iti win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Iwezzen as. Ayen akw ara tefkem n cci, ad awen t id Irr. Neppa, Yif akw im$iten
Ass ideg ara ten Ifser, akken ma llan, imiren ad Yini i lmalayek: "wigi, day llan âabden kwent
A d inint: "gedha s yiseK! D Keçç ay d Bab nne$, war nitni. Xaîi, llan âabden leonun. Tegwti degsen umnen yissen
Assa, ur imlik yiwen i wayev, segwen, aba$uô ne$ ccqa. A Nini i wid idensen: "jeôôbet aâaqeb n tmes, i tellam tnekôem t

Ma $ôan asen issekniyen nne£ ipbegginen, ad inin: "wagi d argaz kan, i ib$an a kwen istixeô, seg wayen llan âabden imezwura nnwen". Ad inin: "ayagi, siwa d tikerkas id innulfan". Wid ijehlen i tidep, mi ten id tusa, ad inin: "ayagi d ssêur n ûûeê kan
Ur asen Nefki tizmamin, ara lemden; ur asen d Nuzen, uqbel ik, aneddaô
Skaddben wid i ten id izwaren. Ur asen tebbwiv ara tis mraw n wayen i ippunefken mi skaddben imazanen iW. A tuzzma W, imiren
Ini: "ar yiwet kan, ara kwen nabi$: a pbeddem zdat Öebbi, di sin, ne$ weêêedwen; sinna, a d tesmektim. Ameddakwel nnwen ur illi d aôehbani. Neppa d aneddaô nnwen kan, uqbel aâaqeb uqsiê
Ini: "ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiât; apan nnwen. Ih, taqdiât iw, ar Öebbi kan. Neppa, $ef yal cci, d Anagi
Ini: "ih, Mass iw Ipqeddim tidep, d Amusnaw n tbavnit
Ini: "tusa d tidep, ur d nezzunt tkerkas, ur d ppalsent
Ini: "ma nnetlafe$, nnetlafe$ kan i iman iw. Ma pwanha$, d ayen iyi d Iweêêa Mass iw. Neppa, ih, d Aqôib, Isell
Lemmer a pwaliv mi xelâan, tarewla ur telli. Pwaîîfen, si tama iqeôben
Nnan: "numen yis". Amek ara d ssiwven, si tama ibaâden
Ni$ llan zik, nekôen t. Rran akin tabavnit, si tama ibaâden
Ad yili ufûil, garasen d wayen ctaqen, akken tevôa, zik, d wid i ten icban. Ih, nitni llan di ccekk imcebbwel
Ccekôan i Öebbi, Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan, i Irran lmalayek d timersulin sut sin, krav, akked kué iferrawen. Irennu, di lxelq, ayen i S ihwan. Öebbi, s tidep, Izmer i yal cci
Ayen Ifka Öebbi uêunu, i medden, ur t itekkes yiwen. Ayen Iîîef, ur izmir yiwen a t id iazen, deffir eS. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
A yimdanen! Mmektit ed a$iti nnwen s$uô Öebbi. Day illa uxellaq, war Öebbi, ikwen iôeéqen seg igenni akked tmurt? Ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa, ihi acimi tessaâwajem
Ma nekôen k, ni$ pwanekôen imazanen, uqbel ik. Ar Öebbi, ara qqlen lumuô
A yimdanen! Ih, lemâahda n Öebbi d tidep. Ur kwen tep$uôôu tmeddurt n ddunit! Ur kwen ipkellix um$weôôi, af Öebbi
Cciîan, s tidep, d acengu nnwen. Ëesbet ep d acengu. Issawal kan, i ukabar is, ad ilin seg wat tmes
I wid ijehlen, aâaqeb uqsiê. I wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ssmaê akked warraz meqqwôen
Day win iwumi Icebbeê yir igiten is, iwakken ad ioâal gerzen…? S tidep, Öebbi Itellif win i S ihwan, Inehhu win i S ihwan. Ur hellek ara iman ik, fellasen. Ih, Öebbi Iéôa acu la ûûenâen
Öebbi i Ippaznen avu, issalayen asigna. Neppawi t ar tmurt immuten, Nessidir ed, yis, akal, deffir tmeppant is. Akka, tanekra
Win ib$an tazmert, tazmert akw ar Öebbi. Awal ukyis ippali $uôeS. Igi ilhan, Iteg as ccan. Aâaqeb uqsiê i wid ippandin tucmitin. A ppemêu tandit nnsen

Ixelq ikwen Öebbi seg wakal; sinna, si tiqqit; sinna, Irra kwen d tiyugiwin. Ur treffed tadist, ur tepparew nnta, siwa ma Iéôa t. Ur Izzi$wzif laâmeô i umuddir, ur as t Issenqas, siwa ma di tezmamt. Ayagi, ih, d ayen isehlen i Öebbi

Ur aâdilen sin ilellen: wa zeddig, éid, iwata i tissit; wayev d ameô$an, d aôéagan. Segsen teppeppem aksum aleqqaq, teppekksem d iâqqucen i teppeqnem. Twalav sfina tepcerrig iten, iwakken a pnadim lfevl iS. Amar a ppesnemmrem
Issekcam iv deg wass, Issekcam ass deg yiv. Iêeppem i yiîij akked waggur, ad lêun ar lajel ipwassnen. D wagi ay d Öebbi, Mass nnwen. IneS tagelda. Wid i tnaâôem, war Neppa, ur rebêen iclem utemôiw
Ma tnaâôem ten, ur sellen i tnaâôit nnwen. Xas slan, ur awen d pparan. Ass n tnekra, ad nekôen ccerk nnwen. Ur k ipxebbiô yiwen am Win Ippuxebbôen
A yimdanen! Kunwi d ime$ban zdat Öebbi. Öebbi d Asâay, d Amaâzuz
Ma ihwa yaS, a kwen Ikkes, a d Iawi lxelq amaynut
I Öebbi, ayagi, ur illi d aéayan

Win ibubben ur ipbibbi taâkkwemt n wayev. Ma isuter ed afus win iâabban, ur s ipwakkas wacemma, xas ma si llezm is. Nabi kan wid ippagwaden Mass nnsen di tbavnit, u péallan. Win ipzekkin, i iman is kan i ipzekki. Tu$alin ar Öebbi
Ur iaâdil uder$al akked win ipwalin
ne$ tillas akked tafat
ne$ tili akked una$uô
Ur aâdilen imuddiren akked lmeggtin. Öebbi, s tidep, Issel i win i S ihwan. Keçç, ur tezmirev a ppeslev i wid illan di tneîlin
Keçç, d aneddaô kan
Ih, Nuzen ik id, s tidep, d abeccaô, d aneddaô. Ur illi lois, mebla ma iusa t id uneddaô
Ma skaddben k, ni$ skaddben wid i ten id izwaren. Usan ten id imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen, s Ihellilen, s Tezmamt timnewweôt
D$a Ssemêalqe$ i wid ijehlen. Amek tuzzma W imiren
Ur twalav ara Öebbi Isse$li d aman seg igenni? Nessuffe$ ed, yissen, ppemôa n yal ini. Deg idurar, isôiden icebêanen, izegwa$en n yal ini, akked iberkanen mavi
Imdanen, lewêuc, lmal, n yal ini ula d nitni. Akka, ger imdanen iS, d imusnawen kan i ippagwaden Öebbi. Ih, Öebbi d Uzmir, Ipsemmiê
Ih, wid iqqaôen Tazmamt n Öebbi, ipéallan, ipseddiqen seg wayen iten N$at, s tuffra ne$ âinani, ad ssirmen ttjaôa ur nepquccu
Akken ad asen Ifk tiqvaâin nnsen, ad asen Irnu si lfevl iS. Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ippara tajmilt
Ayen i k Nweêêa, si Tezmamt, d tidep id itebbten ayen ip id izwaren. Ih, Öebbi, $ef imdanen iS, Ippuxebbeô, Ipwali ten
Sinna, Nerra d iweôôaten n Tezmamt, wid Nefren, ger imdanen nne£. Garasen, llan win idensen iman is, garasen alemmas, garasen win izeggwiren ar lxiô, s wannuf n Öebbi. Wagi d lfevl ameqwôan
Loennet n Âaden, ara kecmen. Din, ad qqnen imeqyasen n ddheb, akked tyuqat. Leêrir, di lebsa nnsen
Ad inin: "cekôan i Öebbi i Issaferen fella$ le$wben. Ih, Mass nne$ Ipsemmiê, Ippara tajmilt
I a$ Irran, s lefvl iS, axxam i tnezdu$t; ur a$ ipnal, degs, wugur; ur a$ ipnal, degs, âaggu
I wid ijehlen, times n Loahennama. Ur tepfukku fellasen, ad mmten; ur ippifsus, fellasen, uâaqeb is. Akka, ay Nepqeîîi yal ajehli

Degs, ad ppu$un: "a Mass nne$! Ssuffe$ ane$, a nexdem ayen ilhan, maççi am akken nella nxeddem"! Day ur awen Nesse$wzef ara laâmeô, akken a d immekti win id ismektayen? Iusa kwen id uneddaô. Ihi jeôôbet. I imednas, ur illi umâiwen
Öebbi Issen tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan. Neppa, s tidep, Iéôa i illan deg idmaren
D Neppa i kwen Iran d igensas di tmurt. Win ijehlen, tijehli s mgal iman is. Tijehli ijehliyen, siwa a$unzu i trennu ar Mass nnsen. Tijehli ijehliyen, siwa taxessaôt i trennu

Ini: "twalam icriken nnwen, la tnaâôem, war Öebbi; sseknet iyi d acu xelqen, si tmurt, ne$ ma sâan amur deg igenwan, ne$ ma Nefka yasen Tazmamt i sen d ipbegginen? Xaîi, aâahed imednas, garasen, d a$uôôu kan
D Öebbi, s tidep, i Iîfen tamurt akked igenwan, ur $ellin ara. Lemmer ad $lin, ur illi yiwen, deffir eS, ara ten iîîfen. Neppa, ih, Izga Iêellem, Ipsemmiê
Gullen s Öebbi, tagalit meqwôen, ar ma iusa ten id uneddaô, ar ad ddun d ubrid, sennig akw leoyus. Mi ten id iusa uneddaô, i asen d irna, siwa tugin

tem$weô di tmurt, akked tnaâuôt tucmip. Ur teppaîîaf tnaâuôt tucmip, siwa bab is. Day ur muqlen ara ar tannumi imezwura? Ur teppafev, d awez$i, abeddel di tannumi n Öebbi. Ur teppafev ara adewwel di tannumi n Öebbi

Day ur unagen ara di tmurt, ad walin amek tevôa d wid i ten id izwaren? Llan $elben ten tazmert. Ur illi win ara sfunngen Öebbi, s wacemma, deg igenwan, ne$ di tmurt. Neppa, ih, Izga d Amusnaw, d Uzmir
Lemmer Ipqeîîi Öebbi imdanen, $ef wayen kesben, ur Ippaooa kra n lxelq sufella n tmurt. Maca, Iswexxiô iten, ar lajel ipwassnen. Ma iusa d lajel nnsen, ihi, Öebbi, deg imdanen iS, Izga Ipwali

Awi asen d amedya: at temdint, mi ten id usan imazanen
Mi sen Nuzen sin, nekôen ten. Null s wis krav. Nnan: "nekwni d imazanen $uôwen
Nnan: "kunwi d imdanen kan, am nekwni. Aênin ur d Issers acemma. Kunwi, teskiddibem kan
Nnan: "Mass nne$ Iéôa, s tidep, ar $uôwen id neppuceggaâ
Ay fella$ kan d timenna ipbegginen
Nnan: "war ccekk, tesskeêsem a$. Ma ur teêbisem ara, a kwen neôoem, u a nessuk fellawen, aâaqeb aqeôêan
Nnan: "lkeês nnwen yidwen. Day imi i kwen smektin? Maca, kunwi d agdud amaâfun
